## email_field_tag(name [,[value,] html_options])
Creates a email input 

options

* pattern: this will default to "^[A-Za-z0-9](([_\.\-]?[a-zA-Z0-9]+)*)@([A-Za-z0-9]+)(([\.\-]?[a-zA-Z0-9]+)*)\.([A-Za-z]{2,})$"

	email_field_tag("email",{"value":"test@email.com"})
	 
	 => 
	 
	<input value='test@email.com' pattern='^[A-Za-z0-9](([_.-]?[a-zA-Z0-9]+)*)@([A-Za-z0-9]+)(([.-]?[a-zA-Z0-9]+)*).([A-Za-z]{2,})$' id='email' type='email' name='email' />
